text: Keshari Nath Tripathi (; 10 November 1934 â€“ 8 January 2023) was an Indian politician. He was the Governor of West Bengal. He took promise as governor of West Bengal on 24 July 2014 and as governor of Bihar on 27 November in 2017. He was selected as the governor of Mizoram on 4 April 2015. He was an experienced BJP leader. Earlier, he was the speaker of Uttar Pradesh legislative assembly and the president of Uttar Pradesh unit of Bharatiya Janata Party. Tripathi died on 8 January 2023 in Prayagraj. He was 88. ==References== ==Other websites== * UP Legislative Assembly Website * Awards |- |- |- Category:1934 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Governors of Bihar Category:Governors of Meghalaya Category:Governors of Mizoram Category:Governors of West Bengal Category:Politicians from Uttar Pradesh Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians
title: Keshari Nath Tripathi
